title: can you please make this change
body: can you please make it so that is you have a dc player at the end of you game you don't lost LP ive lost a good 700 or greater because of this and this happens a lot to me and i know it happens to a lot of other people there we get a dc and it causes us to lose the game like my last game we were winning then the ryze dc's we lose all our damage and then we cant do anything we lose and i lose over a quarter of my LP it is getting over stupid please riot do somthing

replies.body: i dont think it should be 0 loss. but ive always thought that there should be a "handicap" for when a player has been disconnected for a certain amount of time. ie less loss of lp for losing side and also a greater gain if they do manage to win a 4v5. it gives a greater incentive to continue playing.
